attributes.action: Stop the Closure of Royal Sutton Coldfield Police Station
attributes.additional_details: We want Government to intervene and stop the closure of the police Station in Royal Sutton Coldfield and restore it to it previous standard of service to the town.
attributes.background: Make sure the residents of our town are properly protected and serviced by a fully equipped police station

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the closure of local police stations are a matter for the local police force, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
